channel.title: Plugins on Nitro CI
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Nitro CI

item.title: Overview
item.description: The command-line interface can be extended using plugins that can be downloaded from either GitHub or private Git Repositories. Each plugin has to contain a manifest.yml file which specifies the feature that are enabled by the plugin. ---id:218d3caf07424b10a145ee5e1f036174name:bitbucketoperations:configure:enabled:trueflags:- name:usershorthand:utype:stringusage:username- name:passshorthand:ptype:stringusage:passwordenvironments:enabled:truepipelines:enabled:true
